item.description:
Join our Network of Successful Friends                                      

     We are new social media with a focus on upscale adventure. Our web site is an opportunity for you to meet up & socialize with great people, local & world wide. Join us, post yourself on our web site along with a personal greeting. Say hello to the world through Boston Millionaires. We like fine living, night life, boating, golf, social networking, Country Dancing, Cape Cod, fitness, Globe Treking, dining out, Faneuil Hall, ocean travel, exercise, coffee shops, cooking, polo, mountain climbing, surfski kayak racing, brunch, volley ball, soft ball, real estate, Museum of Fine Arts, Darryl's Corner Bar, Middle East Restaurant, TD Ameritrade, Bullfinch Hotel, House of Blues, brunch, auctions, sky diving, bird watching, Hunts Camera, Smokin Joe's BBQ, Regent Theater, foliage tours, cultural events, antiques, museums, boating, ballroom dancing, travel, hiking, biking, skiing, karaoke, Red Sox, Patriots, Bruins, polo, golf, tennis, Shreve Crump and Lowe Jewelry, hot air balloning, yellowumbrella.org, auto show, concerts, opera, art shows, Symphony Hall, Boston Pops, wilderness adventures, kayaking, camping, poker, casinos, Homes of the Rich and Famous, business events, tours, zumba, Whiskey Live, country western, blues music, education, green friendly solar, motorcycles, swing dance, concerts, fishing, Polar Bear Swim, skiing, walking, zoo, carnival cruise, cook out, volunteer, Liberty Hotel, Berklee College of Music. We hope to see you at the next Boston Millionaires Meet Up. Cheers!
item.name: Boston Millionaires
